The Momentum Jacket is a fully waterproof alpine mountain jacket made from lightweight 3 Layer eVent®.

The Momentum is the culmination of years making shell jackets for high level alpinists, forever asking for ever lighter equipment, the Momentum is a climbers shell designed for climbers making ascents in the pure alpine style.

The Momentum features napoleon pockets that are large and easy to access whilst climbing, a proper helmet compatible hood with great movement and visibility along with easy adjustability, water-resistant zips keep the wet out and adjustable velcro cuffs allow sleeves to be rolled up if required. Reflective detailing mean you shouldn't lose your climbing partner in the dark . . . unless you really want to. . .
These features also make the Momentum the ideal multisport jacket combing lightweight with functionality and a great active fit.

The Women's Aurora Pull-on is all new for Spring 2011. It is a lightweight, stretch fit, half zip top that offers protection from sun and elements.

The Aurora offers UPF 50+ protection, a venting chest zip, a single concealed pocket for small items and a hood that fits neatly under a helmet. The fabric offers some wind protection but not at the expense of breathability - the Aurora having an unashamedly warm weather bias! perfect for those long summer days at the crag with the temperature in the high 30's  . . .  (or did we dream those?)
The Rab Aurora Pull-on (on its launch in 2011) was awarded a coveted Backpacker Magazine Editor's Choice award.

New for 2013 the Aurora gets a new hidden addition - Polygiene Anti-bacterial treatment. This basically means that you can wear the Aurora for longer between washes (without offedning those around you..)

The Expedition Suit has been developed over many years in conjunction with active Himalayan climbers and polar explorers. The suit has been designed for high altitude climbing and prolonged travel in extremely cold climates The Expedition Suit has been used extensively on 8000m peaks and Polar expeditions for many years, Rab sponsored athlete Gary Rolfe credits his down suit with saving his life when his dogs and sled fell through Arctic sea ice.
The Expedition Suit is a very specialist piece of kit and as such is not really suitable for any other use.
Please consult your retailer and if possible try one on before purchasing - a list of Expedition Stockists can be found here.
